name: OneMajor Guide
description:
A simple strategy puzzle game where you guide an AI companion to assist you. 

WASD to move player. Left mouse to send an AI partner to a location, Right mouse to call them back. Make it to the end. 

Plan on continuing later on. 

Assets used from: 

-TopDown Engine (MoreMountains)

-PolygonPrototype (Synty Studios)
